sentences.sContent: It’s a lovely house and we’ve been very happy here.
sentences.sCn: 房子很漂亮，我们住在这里非常开心。

sentences.sContent: I’ve never felt happier in my life.
sentences.sCn: 我一生从未感到如此快乐。

sentences.sContent: He was a happy child who rarely cried.
sentences.sCn: 他是一个快乐的孩子，很少哭鼻子。

sentences.sContent: the happy faces of the children
I loved her and thought I could make her happy.
sentences.sCn: 我爱她，我想我能让她幸福快乐。
